author: rhuijben
msg: to use the new presence apis instead of entries. Also move file restoring
and externals handling to functions of their own.
This patch contains the primary refactoring; a few follow up commits
will cleanup some left over issues and will update the public apis,
(restore_node): New function, wrapping restore_file and notifications
inner workings to follow the presence of a node in base and working
instead of the intermediate results stored in entries.

author: stsp
msg: Follow-up to r38983: The new eol functions are supposed to be private,
not public, so rename them accordingly.

author: sbutler
msg: Accidental commit. Reverted. These aren't the droids you're looking for.

(Note that the other paths aren't made absolute.  This is partly because loggy

these paths absolute would blur their relationship with the admin path.)
